statements: DELETE FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type = 'weapon' AND created_at < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM resource_delivery WHERE delivery_type = 'online' AND delivery_status = 'completed';
DELETE FROM game_assets WHERE asset_id = 100 AND asset_type = 'Weapon';
DELETE FROM resource_delivery WHERE delivery_status = 'Pending' AND delivery_type = 'Material';
DELETE FROM assets WHERE asset_type = 'image' AND asset_size > 1024;
DELETE FROM players WHERE player_id = 100 AND player_level = 10;
